attributes.action: Stop Electronic Harassment and the use of Satellite surveillance and Energy Weapons to experiment on innocent Citizens.
attributes.additional_details: This Petition was formed in order to stop and protect UKl citizens from Covert Terrorism and Mind Control Experimentation currently in place in society! There are thousand's of Targeted Individuals globally who are being Tracked, Surveyed, Tortured and Harassed by the useage of Satellites, Transmitters, Cell Towers and Perpetrators using Electronic Energy Weapons (listed by the military as "Electronic Weapons" or "Less than Leathel weapons" / 'High-Powered Microwave Energy Weapons). So far there are well over 10,000 victims worldwide, all of which have been randomly selected and possibly illegally implanted with RFID Microchips for illegal and non-consensual Mind Control experimentations as stated by ex-MI5 Scientist Prof. Barrie Trower. We want this terrorism to be exposed and stopped as it is a breach of Human Rights and an unethical treatment of human beings!
